title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: ICT-Based Mathematical Learning Website Design and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explore mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and apply them to real-world problems using interactive tools on an ICT-based website.
Analyze multimodal materials (text/image/video/simulation) and establish mathematical problem-solving strategies through integrated thinking.
Reflect on and improve the learning process by maintaining continuous communication with peers and instructors via an LMS-based feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
